stamp: U.S. POSTAL CARD ONE CENT 1 JEFFERSON 1
p: I did not say in the other card how glad I'd be to have one of the Sea Nymphs. I am in such a rush half the time that I don't know what have or have not answered.
Just spoke to Maxie. We plan now (indefinitely) to practise tomorrow evening! This eve. they are going to hear E. Rocht. Schmitz and Albert & I go dancing. I have a lesson today.
My throat has been in perfect shape!
Much love to you and to Daddy.
